summary: If Spider-Man Gets a New Suit
title: If Spider-Man Gets a New Suit
body:
One pretty awesome idea for a potential new suit in Spider-Man: Far from Home is a design that is exact or very similar to this.

This design takes a lot of inspiration from Ben Reilly’s suit as Spider-Man.

Anyways, if there is a new suit, what would you like to see? ^_^

reblog.comment:

This design takes a lot of inspiration from Ben Reilly’s suit as Spider-Man.

Anyways, if there is a new suit, what would you like to see? ^_^

Anyways, if there is a new suit, what would you like to see? ^_^

blog.name: gayasfridge
blog.title: I’m Here In Fear Get Used To It

title: Gay! Spider-Man AU
body:
“Faggot!” Peter heard as he rushed through the school halls. He had gotten used to it. Once he and Michael James got together, Flash and his goonies had been insulting and assaulting the two. Nel told him that that bunch was the only group of people that cared, but he knew otherwise. He saw the looks coming from the kids. Mostly the bible club members and the girls that had been desperately hitting on his boyfriend. Not to mention that Aunt May and Mr. Stark didn’t know.  His boyfriend encouraged him to come out, but with what happened to him, Peter didn’t want to risk it. When MJ came out as gay to his parents, he got kicked out of the house altogether. He’s living with some distant relatives now. “Hey, baby. You look upset. Flash giving you hell again? I swear I want to bludgeon that asshole in the face. Or up his asshole, now that I think about it.” “It’s fine, MJ. I just… I want to tell May so bad!” “I know. I’m honestly surprised you kept it from her for this long.” “What are you saying?” “You’re not the best at keeping secrets secret." 

    He was right about that. A few months ago, Peter accidentally sent him a video from when he was on patrol. Couldn’t deny it was him when he had rambled off to a young woman about their last date. The young woman had been getting attacked on the street because the man who had been making advances on her looked at who she was texting and saw it was her girlfriend. Pete took him to the police with the woman, and after just stayed with her. Told her he was gay, about MJ in great detail, and how much he loved him. MJ had, in his trademark emotionless voice he used to freak out people, told him that he had known since they were in DC. Nel on the other hand, she went insane. 
    "Babe, are you listening?” MJ asked, despite knowing full well Peter hadn’t heard a word he said. “I was zoning out.” “Yes, I could kind of tell. I was asking if you wanted to go out for dinner tonight.” “Sure! I’ll meet you on the corner!” “Okay. Just so you know, my aunt wants to meet you, so she might be coming.” “The one you live with?” “No, the rich one.” “I’m really excited!” “Perfect. Now we gotta get to class.”
    “Okay, but that’s only one. you need to prove to me that at least ten bees can bleed.” “Peter this is trying to put a hat on a pigeon all over again. Of course bees have blood inside of them.” The two talked. they got into weird debates more than they would like to admit. The waiter brought them over to an empty table. “She’ll be here soon.” “Michael James is that you?” someone asked. Standing there was a woman Peter immediately recognized. Pepper Potts. Next to her was her fiance and Peter’s idol. Tony Stark. “Aunt Pepper! Uncle Tony! This is my boyfriend. I’m sure you two know him very well…” “You set this up on purpose.” Peter accused his boyfriend. “True. But Pepper helped.” “underoos? You’re..” “Gay. Yeah. I’m really sorry for not saying anything Mr. Stark.” “It’s okay kid. Listen. You know you can talk to me about this stuff. Does May know?” “No, she doesn’t!” MJ shouted. “We can help you come out and all that stuff.” Pepper said. “Thank you all so much.” “Anything for you, baby.” And for the first time out of school, Peter didn’t worry about who say when they kissed.  He was safe with MJ. That’s all that matters.

blog.name: davidmann95
blog.title: Not Even 50% Of My TRUE Power
blog.description: Comics guy, writer guy, Superman guy

summary: Do you have a spider man starter pack? I would’ve sworn you did but I can’t find it, or maybe it was one you reblogged?
question: Do you have a spider man starter pack? I would’ve sworn you did but I can’t find it, or maybe it was one you reblogged?
answer: Afraid not, now that I look; the two big recs are the Essential Spider-Man volumes for however far out they go, and the original Bendis/Bagley Ultimate Spider-Man run. I’m not as well-read on Spidey as my other big favorites, but I’ve got pretty warm feelings towards the DeFalco-era stuff with the black costume since I read it as a kid, and as my dad just got a collection that has Kraven’s Last Hunt, the wedding, AND Spider-Man Vs. Wolverine by Christopher Priest in it, so I imagine I’d also include that as a highlight of the era after I read it. I’ve heard good things about Spider-Man Loves Mary Jane, the beginning of the JMS era was good, Spider-Man Blue’s wonderful, I and I believe I alone quite like Mark Millar’s year of Marvel Knights Spider-Man, To Have And To Hold is a classic, Dan Slott did a couple killer stories like No One Dies and Spider-Man/Human Torch, and Zdarsky’s current Spectacular Spider-Man could be an all-timer in the making if it isn’t really ending soon. Heck, much as I hate to admit it, Nick Spencer’s current run with Ryan Ottley is REALLY good depending on your tolerance for comics written by total assholes. There’s plenty to choose from.

blog.description:
Finally a Tumblr page that
*Insert Witty Comment Here*.

title: Peter Parker, And Doctor Who
body:
Peter Parker: “I don’t want to go, I don’t want to go Mr. Stark.”

The 10th Doctor: “I don’t want to go, I don’t want to go.”

Am I the only one who realized that Peter Parker in Avengers: Infinity War made one last pop culture reference, even when Tony Stark told him not to?

summary: With the new deal between fox and Disney, marvel will be getting the rights back to Deapool. This means that we're finally going...
body: With the new deal between fox and Disney, marvel will be getting the rights back to Deapool. This means that we’re finally going to see Spider-Man and Deadpool on screen together.
